description: This file defines React context providers and hooks related to user authentication and game state management for a Tic Tac Toe game platform. It includes context creation, state management with React hooks, API interactions, and the exporting of provider and hook functions.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: Provides authentication state and functions (login, register, logout, fetchProfile) via React Context.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: Custom React Hook to access authentication context.

methods.name: GameProvider
methods.description: Provides game state and history management via React Context.

methods.name: useGame
methods.description: Custom React Hook to access game state context.
